text: The Gateway PunditDonald Trump says it's time to "Make America Great Again"His big presidential announcement was today at 11 AM ET.Trump BASHED Obama В– a horrible negotiator."Our president doesn't have a clue. He's a bad negotiator. He's the one that did Bergdahl. We get Bergdahl. They get five killer terrorists that everybody wanted over there."
title: Press Release - Donald Trump: Obama Is A Horrible Negotiator "We Got Traitor Bergdahl, They Got 5 Killer Terrorists"
